name: Polaworld
description: Polaworld is a website for a photography company based in Italy. It was created to showcase my skills UI/UX design, and I used HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS

name: Neon Tac Toe
description: Neon Tac Toe is a simple tic tac toe game where I used HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JS to make it. This project focuses not only on Vanilla JS, but also my skills in CSS

name: Pokedex
description: The pokedex is a project that I created to test my abilities in dealing with external APIs, I used PokeAPI, React JS, Styled components, and Sass for this project

name: To do app
description: This todo app utilizes react & redux with the localstorage in order to save the data inside the browser, i also used Sass for styling this website

name: Shortly
description: Shortly is a URL shortener app with a intuitive UI designed by Front-end Mentor. I integrated the shrtcode URL shortening API to make the functionality of the app

name: Space
description: This website is a simple informational website designed by Front-end Mentor. I used HTML SCSS and Javascript for this project.
